name: stringFilter
description: This function uses the callback to filter the elements in a string.

params.name: callback
params.description: The closure function that is executed for each element in the string.

lucee.notes: This function is being added in Lucee 6. It is similar to the other Lucee `.filter()` functions.

links.title: Lucee - LDEV-3179 Ticket to add stringFilter
links.description: Lucee ticket to add function in Lucee 6.

examples.title: Full function
examples.description: Return only the letters in the string that meet the callback condition.

examples.title: Member function
examples.description: Return only the letters in the string that meet the callback condition.
